a.span: Encuesta de Servicio al Cliente de SLUSD

li.span: COVID-19 Resources for Families, Students, and Staff

div.h1: COVID-19 Resources for Families, Students, and Staff

a.span: COVID-19 Resources for Families, Students, and Staff
Resources from San Leandro Public Library

div.h1: All SLUSDschool sites and facilities are closed to students, staff, and the community throughthe end of the 2019-2020 school year.
div.div: SLUSD will continueessential operations during the closure and communicate regularly with you throughout this time, but there will beno public access.During this period, each school will also receive a deep cleaning.
div.h2: COVID-19 Resources for Families, Students, and Staff

div.p: TheSan Leandro Unified School District continues to take appropriate actions related to the outbreak of respiratory illness caused by the novel coronavirus (COVID-19). This page is intended to provide information about COVID-19, precautions that are being taken and prevention measures you can take, as well as information on theefforts that public agencies are taking to stem the outbreak.

This is an evolving situation, and updates are available fromthe Alameda County Public Health Departmentandthe Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), including updatedTravel Noticesfor countries with community transmission. These pages are not intended to be all-encompassing and should not be considered to be providing medical or legal advice. In all instances, you should consult with a relevant expert for guidance specific to your circumstances.
835 E. 14th Street, Suite 200, San Leandro, CA 94577

div.data-social-icon-toggles: facebook-true youtube-false twitter-true pinterest-false vimeo-false flickr-false linkedin-true instagram-false rss-false

div.span: San Leandro Unified School District is committed to ensuring all district and school websites are accessible for all people regardless of ability or access method. We welcome your feedback and suggestions. If you have any difficulty accessing information on our websites, please contact the Webmaster at webmaster@slusd.us.
